verbs.description: The meeting between Pompeo and Kim [V: was] instead arranged on the spot , Trump says .
[ARG1: The meeting between Pompeo and Kim] was [ARGM-ADV: instead] [V: arranged] [ARGM-TMP: on the spot] , Trump says .
[ARG1: The meeting between Pompeo and Kim was instead arranged on the spot] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: says] .
